role_description: An Ansible role that backs up docker-compose projects to Wasabi via Restic
role_description_full_overview: It will clone and start up projects that have not been initialized and backup projects that are already running. It also uses git instead of Wasabi for anything that is not a volume (i.e. folder mounts).
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that backs up docker-compose projects to Wasabi via Restic.
